\startmode[*mkii]
  \enableregime[utf-8]  
  \setupcolors[state=start]
\stopmode

\setupcolor[hex]
\definecolor[titlegrey][h=757575]
\definecolor[sectioncolor][h=397249]
\definecolor[rulecolor][h=9cb770]

% Enable hyperlinks
\setupinteraction[state=start, color=sectioncolor]

\setuppapersize [A4][A4]
\setuplayout    [width=middle, height=middle,
                 backspace=20mm, cutspace=0mm,
                 topspace=10mm, bottomspace=20mm,
                 header=0mm, footer=0mm]

%\setuppagenumbering[location={footer,center}]

\setupbodyfont[11pt, helvetica]

\setupwhitespace[medium]

\setupblackrules[width=31mm, color=rulecolor]

\setuphead[chapter]      [style=\tfd]
\setuphead[section]      [style=\tfd\bf, color=titlegrey, align=middle]
\setuphead[subsection]   [style=\tfb\bf, color=sectioncolor, align=right,
                          before={\leavevmode\blackrule\hspace}]
\setuphead[subsubsection][style=\bf]

\setuphead[chapter, section, subsection, subsubsection][number=no]

%\setupdescriptions[width=10mm]

\definedescription
  [description]
  [headstyle=bold, style=normal,
   location=hanging, width=18mm, distance=14mm, margin=0cm]

\setupitemize[autointro, packed]    % prevent orphan list intro
\setupitemize[indentnext=no]

\setupfloat[figure][default={here,nonumber}]
\setupfloat[table][default={here,nonumber}]

\setuptables[textwidth=max, HL=none]
\setupxtable[frame=off,option={stretch,width}]

\setupthinrules[width=15em] % width of horizontal rules

\setupdelimitedtext
  [blockquote]
  [before={\setupalign[middle]},
   indentnext=no,
  ]

\subsection[title={About Me},reference={about-me}]

\startdescription{Full Name}
  Jingliang Jiang
\stopdescription

\startdescription{Experience}
  9 years total, 6 years in multi-national companys, including AMD and
  Cisco
\stopdescription

  part-time for Master
\stopdescription

  September
\stopdescription

  Chinese, English
\stopdescription

\startdescription{Writing Level}
  Excellent in both
\stopdescription

\startdescription{Spoken Level}
  Fluent in English, Excellent in Chinese
\stopdescription

\startdescription{Key Words}
  H264, HEVC, VP9, FFMPEG, ASIC, RTL, FPGA
\stopdescription

\subsection[title={Technology Stack},reference={technology-stack}]

\startdescription{ASIC Verification}
  Video Codec(H264, H265, VP9, AV1, MJPEG), misc interface(rs232,
  spi,flash)
\stopdescription

\startdescription{Video Codec}
  Have a full understanding about the video codecs, both in asic design
  and software stack development
\stopdescription

\startdescription{Language}
  C/C++, Python, C\#, Bash, Java, Javascript
\stopdescription

\subsection[title={Working Experience},reference={working-experience}]

\startdescription{2017/12-Now}
  {\bf \useURL[url5][https://www.amd.com/][][Advanced Micro Devices,
  Inc]\from[url5]} Senior Firmware Engineer

  AMD today develops high-performance computing and visualization
  products to solve some of the world's toughest and most interesting
  challenges.

  \startitemize[packed]
  \item
    Setting up all necessary hardware platform to support team work.
  \item
    Handle the video codec IP verification.
  \item
    Bringup the video codec IP of the ASIC.
  \item
    Setup auto regression for all test suite
  \item
    Developing the video codec (H264,HEVC,VP9) IP verification framework
    during both for the pre-silicon and post-silicon period.
  \stopitemize
\stopdescription

\startdescription{2014/5-2017/11}
  {\bf \useURL[url6][http://www.infotm.com][][Shanghai InfoTM
  Microelectronics Co., Ltd.]\from[url6]} Senior Software Engineer; IT
  team leader

  InfoTM Co., Ltd.~is an intelligent system operator with integrated
  circuit design and development as the core and provides intelligent
  terminal by integration and optimization of supply chain and offers
  system service supported by big data operating.

  \startitemize[packed]
  \item
    Catch the bringup plan from ASIC design team.
  \item
    Handle the video codec IP verification.
  \item
    Handle the misc IP verification.
  \item
    Implement new software video stack for video application
  \item
    Support customer for new software stack
  \stopitemize
\stopdescription

\startdescription{2011/10-2014/04}
  {\bf \useURL[url7][https://www.cisco.com/][][Cisco Systems,
  Inc.]\from[url7]} Software Engineer

  Cisco is the worldwide leader in IT, networking, and cybersecurity
  solutions.

  \startitemize[packed]
  \item
    Develop Virtualization thin client
  \item
    Implement Networking Protocal
  \item
    Develop virtualization software client in thin client
  \item
    Add misc device support for thin client, such as printer, IR remote
    controler, touching screen, XBox kinect and so on.
  \item
    Add vehicle can bus device support for thin client.
  \stopitemize
\stopdescription

\startdescription{2018/9-2019/9}
  {\bf OpenStack Deploy - INFOTM} Senior Software Engineer

  Use OpenStack to re-orgnize the structure of the company.

    Design server and networking structure and define the budget.
  \item

\stopdescription

\startdescription{2014/6-2017/9}
  {\bf Asic Chip verification - INFOTM} Senior Software Engineer

  Infotm provided various chips for IPC, Game Station, SportDV, Android
  Pad, such as Imapx 200/800(pad), Apollo 1/2/x(IPC,SportDV,NVR), Corona
  2/3(Game Station for Tencent), I handled the vodeo codec IP
  verification, including in pre-silicon, post-silicon, driver
  implement, video framework implement.

  \startitemize[packed]
  \item
    Keep video codec IPs(From Synopsys, include H1,H2,G1,G2) match the
    criterion of the design plan
  \item
    Help design team to estimate and measure the efficiency and power
    consumption
  \item
    Implement the BMS code based uboot to verify the design in RTL, FPGA
    and bringup period
  \item
    Verify other misc IPs in some projects(RS232, SPI, Flash Controler,
    OSD and so on)
  \stopitemize
\stopdescription

\startdescription{2016/9-2017/9}
  {\bf Asic Chip software stack update - INFOTM} Senior Software
  Engineer

  Update the whole software stack for new framework to support more
  flexible video application.

  \startitemize[packed]
  \item
    Design the video flow framework and implement the main base job
  \item
    Implement most of video modules for new video framework
  \item
    Implement supporting modules for new framework(such video
    filesystem(parse and store bitstream based ffmpeg), rtp tools, video
    quality setting tools and so on )\crlf
  \item
    Implement new build system for new software stack, based on
    buildroot and qemu.
  \stopitemize
\stopdescription

\startdescription{2017/3-2017/11}
  {\bf Customer Support - INFOTM} Senior Product Support Engineer

  With the chip and software stack update, I switch my work to focus on
  the support for customers.

  \startitemize[packed]
  \item
    Help customers to solve issues during the whole application
  \item
    Help customer's hardware/software teams to dig root cause of bug,
    then solve by myself or assign the solution to correct team
  \item
    Track project process
  \stopitemize
\stopdescription

\stopdescription

\startdescription{2011/10-2012/2}
  {\bf Bluebird vehicle client module - Cisco} Software Engineer,
  Hardware Engineer

  A car client module for vehicles, can support the thin client usage
  and server usage

  \startitemize[packed]
